<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="OEHRM Cerner Access Request">847a335c1bf19050506855361a4bcb28</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:cddc40a41b759050506855361a4bcbe9</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Pull Title and Phone for Current User</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var user = g_form.getReference('sys_user', populateTitle); // doAlert is our callback function
}
function populateTitle(user) { //reference is passed into callback as first arguments
 g_form.setValue('u_string_title', user.title);
   g_form.setValue('u_string_phone', user.phone);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-10 17:49:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a66d3ee71bf110904662dbd3cc4bcb08</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pull Title and Phone for Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OEHRM Access Management" source="x_snc_oehrm_tio_ac">85875b331bdd1010506855361a4bcb0d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OEHRM Access Management">85875b331bdd1010506855361a4bcb0d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a66d3ee71bf110904662dbd3cc4bcb08</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-10 17:51:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>1</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
